law.catch_line: Administration of taxes authorized by KRS 160.613 and 160.614.
law.text: For purposes of administering the taxes authorized by KRS 160.613 and 160.614 relating to the sourcing of communications services and the rights of customers, the provisions of KRS 136.602, 136.605, and 139.775 shall apply.
law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 18, effective July 1, 2007. -- Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 79, sec. 5, effective July 1, 2005.
